item.title: Computer Science for Humanities
item.description: Computer science is no more about computers than astronomy is about telescopes, biology about microscopes, or chemistry about beakers and test tubes. Science is not about tools. It is about how we use them, and what we find out when we do. — Michael Fellows and Ian Parberry Imagine if today without computer technology, maybe we still doing everything in manual way and paper everywhere without gadget, internet connection, smart device, and many things.
